Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class LocalClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.Client
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.LocalClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControlBase
public class LocalClient extends Client implements ControlBase
Singleton class for manage a local match

      public void setMatchController​(MatchController controller)

    • write

      public boolean write​(StoCMessage msg)
      Writes something to this player, the message has to be written in one of the subclasses of StoCMessage
      Specified by:
      write in interface ControlBase
      Parameters:
      msg - the message you want to send to this player
      Returns:
      true if the message has been sent, false if something goes wrong in the output stream
